description: An MCP server that connects ZetaChain CLI into your editor. Query balances, send cross-chain transactions, and manage universal contracts directly through MCP.

capabilities.name: accounts_show
capabilities.description: View details of a specific account

capabilities.name: query_balances
capabilities.description: Fetch native and ZRC-20 token balances

capabilities.name: query_cctx
capabilities.description: Track the status of a cross-chain transaction.

capabilities.name: query_contracts_list
capabilities.description: List protocol contracts on all connected chains

capabilities.name: query_contracts_show
capabilities.description: Show a protocol contract address on a specific chain

capabilities.name: query_tokens_show
capabilities.description: Show details for a ZRC-20 token

capabilities.name: query_chains_show
capabilities.description: Show details for a connected chain

capabilities.name: faucet
capabilities.description: Request testnet ZETA tokens from the faucet

capabilities.name: zetachain_call
capabilities.description: Call a contract on a connected chain from ZetaChain

capabilities.name: zetachain_withdraw
capabilities.description: Withdraw tokens from ZetaChain to a connected chain

capabilities.name: zetachain_withdraw-and-call
capabilities.description: Withdraw tokens and call a contract on a connected chain

capabilities.name: evm_call
capabilities.description: Call a contract on ZetaChain from an EVM-compatible chain

capabilities.name: evm_deposit-and-call
capabilities.description: Deposit tokens and call a contract on ZetaChain from an EVM-compatible chain

capabilities.name: evm_deposit
capabilities.description: Deposit tokens to ZetaChain from an EVM-compatible chain

capabilities.name: solana_call
capabilities.description: Call a contract on ZetaChain from Solana

capabilities.name: solana_deposit-and-call
capabilities.description: Deposit tokens from Solana and call a contract on ZetaChain

capabilities.name: sui_deposit-and-call
capabilities.description: Deposit tokens from Sui and call a contract on ZetaChain

capabilities.name: ton_deposit-and-call
capabilities.description: Deposit TON and call a contract on ZetaChain

capabilities.name: bitcoin_inscription_deposit-and-call
capabilities.description: Deposit BTC and call a contract on ZetaChain

capabilities.name: bitcoin_inscription_encode
capabilities.description: Encode data for Bitcoin transactions using ABI encoding

capabilities.name: bitcoin_memo_deposit-and-call
capabilities.description: Deposit BTC and call a contract on ZetaChain
